ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 126
ygData.msgSnippet: I m mostly a solo guy, and since Qeynos hills is a newbie zone, there usually isn t anyone 30+ to group with right there.  You are correct that a small group
ygData.messageBody:
I'm mostly a solo guy, and since Qeynos hills is a newbie zone, there
usually isn't anyone 30+ to group with right there. You are correct that a
small group should have no problems taking him.

The one time that I killed Varsoon the necro he had nothing but a rusty
dagger, so I'm guessing that I was either unlucky, he is like Pyzjn and has
at item that is only rare drop, or he is like the other low level necro that
spawns in the zone that never drops anything except a rusty dagger.

Since I wasn't expecting the Varsoon the Undying when I killed Varsoon the
necro the first time, I wasn't ready for him, and I zoned at BB. I kited
him pretty far so I didn't know he was a spellcaster, sounds like I lucked
out big time. <G> After I zoned back I found that someone else had trained
him to the guards, so no body, and no one found out what he drops (if
anything).

Since I'm hearing a variety of levels, I'm guessing that he is either a
variable level spawn or he is different levels on different servers (I've
come across that before, was a big flame war on another list over two people
who were sure the same crit was a different level...)

What Pyzjn drops is the Glowing Black Stone, it is held in off hand (might
be able to hold it in either hand, not sure) and grants +9 int and +10 sv
magic...used to be the best thing for a caster to hold in his off hand
before the glowing stein quest went public.

Problem is getting Pyzjn to spawn...I have seen him a total ot 2 times, and
neither time did he have the damn rock. I have heard he is on a 6 hour
spawn, and Varsoon, Pyzjn, and one other low level necro that drops jack
might spawn every 6 hours. Rumor only though. Also, the damn rock is damn
rare, about the same as getting Drez to drop jboots....about a 10% chance
every time he spawns <sigh>

Most people hear about the cool item, go the qeynos hills for a weekend,
never even see the bastard, and give up in disgust.

I'm heading back there to replenish my stock of bat wings, so maybe I'll see
one of them and have more info later. I'll keep you posted if I come across
anyting interesting.

-Ma`ar, Innoruuk

>Get a caster buddy then root and shoot then...or just leave him alone. What
>do the pair of them drop? And what does Pyzgin drop? Shimmering Orb or
>something wierd for mage types (I be a shaman, so have no interest in it).
>

>spells

>
